Key Match Events: Baris Yilmaz collected a second yellow card and was dismissed in the 64th minute
Sorba Thomas broke through the lines and lobbed the goalkeeper only to be ruled offside in the 37th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Former Wales captain Craig Bellamy was appointed manager in early July
Wales have score to settle ahead of Turkey Nations League clash
Connor Roberts says there is fresh energy around Wales under Craig Bellamy
Wales are preparing to qualify for the 2026 World Cup
Turkey reached the quarter-finals of Euro 2024 and are in very fine form
Post-Match Reflections: Wales manager Craig Bellamy brought excitement back to Wales and the new era got off to a promising start
The match was the first game in charge for new manager Craig Bellamy
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Cardiff City Stadium
Aaron Ramsey and Harry Wilson juggled playmaking duties admirably
Baris Yilmaz left the field after collecting two yellow cards
